CmdLine: apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 7F0CEB10 &&     apt-get -qq update &&     apt-get -qq -y install         mongodb-org-server         mongodb-org-shell         mongodb-org-tools &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* &&     mkdir -p /etc/service/mongo &&     touch /etc/service/mongo/run
Commands.Name: run
